name: Borderline Cookery
description:
Embark on an adventure as a chef in a 2D Side Scroller Action Game made by a team of student game developers from Malaysia using Unity. Be stunned by the scenery of the medieval times, be wary of dangers of the many creatures in your path and be taken aback by the chibi art style in your adventure.

Meet the team behind the game:

https://naimiskandar22.wixsite.com/borderlinecookery
